title: A Random Workbench
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:halloween]] [[module css]] #page-title { display: none; } .feature-block { height: 230px; } .feature-block .panel-body { height: 160px; overflow-y: hidden; color: #800000 } .feature-block .feature-title { font-size: 120%; font-weight: bold; } .feature-block .feature-subtitle { font-size: 90%; } .feature-block .feature-title > p, .feature-block .feature-subtitle > p { margin: 0; color: #800000 } .news-block .panel-body { padding: 0; color: #800000 } .news-block .panel-body .alternate { padding: 5px 10px; } .news-block .news-title { font-weight: bold; font-size: 110%; margin-bottom: 5px; color: #633; } .news-block .news-content { margin: 5px 0; color: #800000 } .news-block .news-title > p, .news-block .news-content > p { margin: 0; color: #800000 } .international-block .panel-body { padding: 0; color: #800000 } .international-entry { padding: 5px 10px; } .international-entry:nth-child(even), .alternate:nth-child(even) { background-color: rgba(255,255,255,.9); border-top: solid 1px #eeeee0; border-bottom: solid 1px #eeeee0; } .international-entry div > p { margin: 0; } .international-entry .international-title { font-weight: bold; font-size: 110%; } .international-entry .international-title img { width: 16px; height: 11px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5); } .international-entry .international-description { font-size: 90%; font-style: italic; margin: 5px 20px; } .international-entry .international-footer { font-size: #333; font-size: 80%; margin: 5px 0; } [[/module]] [[=]] [!-- This image acts as a thumbnail. --] [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/250_logo.png width="0" height="0"]] [[/=]] [[div style="text-align: center; color: #600;"]] [[div class="unmargined"]] WARNING: THE FOUNDATION DATABASE IS [[/div]] [[div class="unmargined" style="font-size: 400%; font-weight: bold; margin: 2px 0 5px;"]] CLASSIFIED [[/div]] [[div class="unmargined"]] ACCESS BY UNAUTHORIZED PERSONNEL IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED PERPETRATORS WILL BE TRACKED, LOCATED, AND DETAINED [[/div]] [[/div]] [!-- * This is commented out until it's needed. * --] [[div class="content-panel centered standalone"]] [[/div]] [!-- --] [!-- * This is commented out until it's needed. * --] [!-- --] [!-- * This is commented out until it's needed. * --] [!-- [[div class="content-panel centered standalone"]] [[size 300%]] placeholder text [[/size]] [[size 150%]] placeholder text [[/size]] [[/div]] --] [[div class="content-panel centered standalone" style = "color:maroon"]] **The [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/halloween-contest-2018| Halloween Contest]]] is OVER! Congratulations to [[*user Rounderhouse]] with the winning tale: [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/mtf-sigma-5-pumpkin-punchers |MTF Sigma-5 "Pumpkin Punchers"]]]!!** [[/div]] [[div class="feature-block"]] [[div class="content-panel left-column"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] Featured SCP [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[div class="feature-title"]] [[[SCP-2232 | SCP-2232: Birdphone. Think Different.]]] [[/div]] [[div class="feature-subtitle"]] by [[user minmin]] [[/div]] //Using SCP-2232 to call a valid telephone number causes it to transform into a common hill myna, which then appears to reproduce via budding to produce a second, smaller myna.// [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]] [[[Featured SCP Archive]]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="content-panel right-column"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] Featured Tale [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[div class="feature-title"]] [[[CryogenChaos Comment Tales | CryogenChaos' Comment Tales]]] [[/div]] [[div class="feature-subtitle"]] by [[user CryogenChaos]] [[/div]] //These "micro tales", as they were, have generally been well received by the community, and even sparked full tale fodder.// [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]] [[[Featured Tale Archive]]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="content-panel left-column"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] Featured GoI Format document [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[div class="feature-title"]] [[[the-dark-web-dke79-o2rg5-4jlw6 | 'The Dark Web' (DKE79/O2RG5/4JLW6)]]] [[/div]] [[div class="feature-subtitle"]] by [[user DrChandra]] [[/div]] //It is operated by a shell company in order to avoid any uncouth associations our customers may have against the Marshall, Carter and Dark brand.// [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]] [[[Featured GoI Format Archive]]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="content-panel right-column"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] Event Feature: //shadow// monthly feature #3 [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[div class="feature-title"]] [[[SCP-1553 | SCP-1553: Dr. Wondertainment's Shadow Paint Play-Set!]]] [[/div]] [[div class="feature-subtitle"]] by [[user FortuneFavorsBold]] [[/div]] //If SCP-1553-A is used to depict an animal or humanoid, the image will spontaneously animate upon drying...// [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]] [[[Event Featured Archive]]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ [[div class="news-block content-panel"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] News [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [!-- PLEASE LIMIT THE PAGE TO FIVE NEWS ARTICLES --] [!-- Pretty sure the five-page limit was specifically for the old template. -Quik --] [!-- Troy was here. Moose is deadly. Zyn does not approve of calling others ugly. Esko is a bear. Light's just radiant. Roget is the actual worst. Drew is the Bear Overlord. A Kaktus is a desert plant. Lurkd is hiding under your chair. Decibelle is a princess~ Silber is better than bronze. ARD is bizarre.--] [[div class="alternate unmargined"]] [[div class="news-title"]] October 7, 2018 [[/div]] [[div class="news-content"]] The international branches of the SCP community have teamed up to bring you a collection of translated SCPs from around the world! New articles are posted daily, and you can view them at the **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-international International Branches Hub]**! [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="alternate unmargined"]] [[div class="news-title"]] August 17, 2018 [[/div]] [[div class="news-content"]] The [[[scp4000contesthub| SCP-4000 Contest]]] is over! Be sure to check out all the entries! [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-series-5 Series V] is now open! [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="alternate unmargined"]] [[div class="news-title"]] July 12, 2018 [[/div]] [[div class="news-content"]] [[[SCPDeclassified]]], a [https://www.reddit.com/r/SCPDeclassified/ subreddit] devoted to literary analyses and plot explanations of SCP articles and concepts, recently reached 10,000 subscribers. Congratulations to them, and we look forward to reading their future declassifications! [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="alternate unmargined"]] [[div class="news-title"]] June 20, 2018 [[/div]] [[div class="news-content"]] The [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp4000contesthub |4000 Contest]]] is live! In honor of the site's 10th anniversary, the contest's theme is HISTORY! Here's to an epic contest and another ten years of SCP! [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="alternate unmargined"]] [[div class="news-title"]] May 21, 2018 [[/div]] [[div class="news-content"]] The **[https://scp-pt-br.wikidot.com/ Portuguese Branch]** is the newest member of the International SCP community! We wish them the best of luck and great success! [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]] [[[Archived News]]] [[/div]] [[/div]] ---- [[div class="international-block content-panel"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] Official Sister Sites [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[div class="international-entry"]] [[div class="international-title"]] [[image SerpHand.png]] [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com The Wanderers Library] -- Fiction From Another World. [[/div]] [[div class="international-description"]] The Wanderers Library is the Foundation's longest-served sister site and uncovers the tomes contained within the Library, home to the Serpents Hand and the repository of all knowledge anywhere. [[/div]] [[div class="international-footer"]] Admins: -- [[user Jack Manganese]] -- [[user rumetzen]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]]   [!-- Placeholder --] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="international-block content-panel"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] SCP International [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[div class="international-entry"]] [[div class="international-title"]] [[image int.png]] [https://scp-int.wikidot.com/ SCP-INT] -- International Translation Archive [[/div]] [[div class="international-description"]] A gathering place for the International Community of the SCP Foundation [[/div]] [[div class="international-footer"]] Admins: [[user dr-grym]] -- [[user dr-grom]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]]   [!-- Placeholder --] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="international-block content-panel"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] International Sites [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[div class="international-entry"]] [[div class="international-title"]] [[image ru.png]] [https://scp-ru.wikidot.com/ SCP-RU] -- SCP Foundation (Russian Branch) [[/div]] [[div class="international-description"]] Russian Counterpart! Translation available **[https://translate.google.ca/translate?hl=en&sl=ru&tl=en&u=http%3A%2F%2Fscp-ru.wikidot.com%2F here]**. The Russian site is the oldest of the translation sites active on the web. [[/div]] [[div class="international-footer"]] Admins: [[user Gene R]] -- [[user Osobist]] -- [[user Resure]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="international-entry"]] [[div class="international-title"]] [[image kr.png]] [https://scp-kr.wikidot.com/ SCP-KO] -- SCP 재단 [[/div]] [[div class="international-description"]] Our Korean Colleagues! Translation available **[https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=ko&tl=en&js=n&prev=_t&hl=en&ie=UTF-8&layout=2&eotf=1&u=http%3A%2F%2Fscpkoreahq.wikidot.com%2F here]**. [[/div]] [[div class="international-footer"]] Admins: [[user Salamander724]] -- [[user QAZ135]] -- [[user shfoakdls]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="international-entry"]] [[div class="international-title"]] [[image cn.png]] [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/ SCP-CN] -- SCP基金会 [[/div]] [[div class="international-description"]] Our Chinese Branch! Translation available **[https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=zh-CN&tl=en&prev=_dd&u=http%3A%2F%2Fscp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com%2F here]**. [[/div]] [[div class="international-footer"]] Admins: [[user areyoucrazytom]] -- [[user SunnyClockwork]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="international-entry"]] [[div class="international-title"]] [[image fr.png]] [https://fondationscp.wikidot.com/ SCP-FR] -- Fondation SCP [[/div]] [[div class="international-description"]] The French have joined! Translation available **[https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=auto&tl=en&js=n&prev=_t&hl=en&ie=UTF-8&eotf=1&u=http%3A%2F%2Ffondationscp.wikidot.com%2F&act=url here]**. Translation available **[https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=pl&tl=en&u=https://scp-pl.wikidot.com/ here]**! [[/div]] [[div class="international-footer"]] Admins: [[user Mefioo9]] -- [[user Wanna-amigo]] -- [[user Dr_Blackpeace]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="international-entry"]] [[div class="international-title"]] [[image es.png]] [https://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/ SCP-ES] -- La Fundación SCP [[/div]] [[div class="international-description"]] The Spanish Branch! Translation available **[https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=es&tl=en&u=http%3A%2F%2Flafundacionscp.wikidot.com%2F&sandbox=1 here]**! Translation available **[https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=th&tl=en&u=http%3A%2F%2Fscp-th.wikidot.com%2F&sandbox=1 here]**!
